mapper.insert: insert into tb_business (business_id, name, taxes_code, trade_id, address, domain, tel, corporate_mobile, check_report, pass_certificate, service_tel, complaint_tel, user_id, lcd) values (#{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complaintTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lcd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_business set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxes_code = #{taxesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trade_id = #{tradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporate_mobile = #{corporateMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_certificate = #{passCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_tel = #{serviceTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complaint_tel = #{complaintTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lcd = #{lcd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select business_id, name, taxes_code, trade_id, address, domain, tel, corporate_mobile, check_report, pass_certificate, service_tel, complaint_tel, user_id, lcd from tb_business where business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select business_id, name, taxes_code, trade_id, address, domain, tel, corporate_mobile, check_report, pass_certificate, service_tel, complaint_tel, user_id, lcd from tb_business
mapper.insert: insert into tb_business (name, team_name,taxes_code, trade_id, address, domain, tel, corporate_mobile, user_id, last_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{taxesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
